html:
Digital Acquisition, Conversion and Retention

This module has been designed to explore and understand the theories associated with acquisition, conversion and retention in digital marketing campaigns. You will learn how to evaluate and apply different digital marketing techniques in diverse organisational types and in different contexts. This will allow you to develop key digital skills to solve real life situations.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Compare and contrast approaches to acquire, convert and retain customers using digital marketing tools. [Knowledge and Understanding]

+  Utilise digital theory and practice to analyse and interpret data to solve a business issue or help make its operations more efficient / effective. [Analysis]

+  Critically evaluate digital marketing tools for acquisition, conversion and retention in different contexts. of a commercial and professional situation. [Problem Solving]

Module Content:
